SELECT -- 获取昨天的存账，如果没有则使用初始存账值 COALESCE( (SELECT stock_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE stat_date = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)), (SELECT initial_stock_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE initial_stock_count IS NOT NULL ORDER BY stat_date ASC LIMIT 1), 0 ) + -- 加上今天的进账减去出账 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(schedule_end_date) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%'))

SELECT COALESCE( (SELECT in_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE stat_date = CURDATE()), (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) ) as in_count, COALESCE( (SELECT out_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE stat_date = CURDATE()), (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(schedule_end_date) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) ) as out_count, COALESCE( (SELECT stock_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE stat_date = CURDATE()), -- 如果今天没有记录，实时计算存账 COALESCE( (SELECT stock_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE stat_date = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)), (SELECT initial_stock_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE initial_stock_count IS NOT NULL ORDER BY stat_date ASC LIMIT 1), 0 ) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(schedule_end_date) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) ) as stock_count, -- 检查是否已设置初始存账 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ledger_stats WHERE initial_stock_count IS NOT NULL) > 0 as has_initial_stock
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ledger_stats (stat_date, initial_stock_count, initial_set_by, initial_set_time, stock_count, in_count, out_count) VALUES (CURDATE(), #{initialStockCount}, #{setBy}, NOW(), #{initialStockCount}, 0, 0) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE initial_stock_count = #{initialStockCount}, initial_set_by = #{setBy}, initial_set_time = NOW(), stock_count = #{initialStockCount}, update_time = NOW()

INSERT INTO ledger_stats (stat_date, in_count, out_count, stock_count) SELECT CURDATE() as stat_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) as in_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(schedule_end_date) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) as out_count, -- 存账 = 昨天的存账 + (今天的进账 - 今天的出账) COALESCE( (SELECT stock_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE stat_date = DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY)), (SELECT initial_stock_count FROM ledger_stats WHERE initial_stock_count IS NOT NULL ORDER BY stat_date ASC LIMIT 1), 0 ) + (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(create_time) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) - (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM electric_info WHERE DATE(schedule_end_date) = CURDATE() AND (sample_id IS NULL OR sample_id NOT LIKE '%CD%')) as stock_count ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE in_count = VALUES(in_count), out_count = VALUES(out_count), stock_count = VALUES(stock_count), update_time = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
